Amelie.line: Oh, these mountains... Yes, I actually know them quite well.
Around 20 years ago, I participated in a research expedition here. The things I saw...

Narrator.line: She pauses. It's as if the events are unfolding right before her eyes.

Elliot.line: Would you be willing to tell me a bit more about them?

Amelie.line: Honestly... I would. Perhaps I even will. But now, under the current circumstances, you would probably not believe me. Perhaps given different conditions, I might tell it to you, another time.
